title: trace_block does not report mining or uncle rewards
body:
Calling `trace_block` against OpenEthereum returns not only transaction traces, but also an issuance trace for the block. For example, 

```
curl -s --data '{"method":"trace_block","params":["0xb443"],"id":"1","jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST http://localhost:8545
```

returns this data (which you can see includes the block reward).

```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": [
    {
      "action": {
        "callType": "call",
        "from": "0xa1e4380a3b1f749673e270229993ee55f35663b4",
        "gas": "0x0",
        "input": "0x",
        "to": "0x5df9b87991262f6ba471f09758cde1c0fc1de734",
        "value": "0x7a69"
      },
      "blockHash": "0x4e3a3754410177e6937ef1f84bba68ea139e8d1a2258c5f85db9f1cd715a1bdd",
      "blockNumber": 46147,
      "result": {
        "gasUsed": "0x0",
        "output": "0x"
      },
      "subtraces": 0,
      "traceAddress": [],
      "transactionHash": "0x5c504ed432cb51138bcf09aa5e8a410dd4a1e204ef84bfed1be16dfba1b22060",
      "transactionPosition": 0,
      "type": "call"
    },
    {
      "action": {
        "author": "0xe6a7a1d47ff21b6321162aea7c6cb457d5476bca",
        "rewardType": "block",
        "value": "0x4563918244f40000"
      },
      "blockHash": "0x4e3a3754410177e6937ef1f84bba68ea139e8d1a2258c5f85db9f1cd715a1bdd",
      "blockNumber": 46147,
      "result": null,
      "subtraces": 0,
      "traceAddress": [],
      "transactionHash": null,
      "transactionPosition": null,
      "type": "reward"
    }
  ],
  "id": "1"
}
```

Block 3 is an example of a block with no transactions but both a block and an uncle reward. I've included the return below for reference:

```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": [
    {
      "action": {
        "author": "0x5088d623ba0fcf0131e0897a91734a4d83596aa0",
        "rewardType": "block",
        "value": "0x478eae0e571ba000"
      },
      "blockHash": "0x3d6122660cc824376f11ee842f83addc3525e2dd6756b9bcf0affa6aa88cf741",
      "blockNumber": 3,
      "result": null,
      "subtraces": 0,
      "traceAddress": [],
      "transactionHash": null,
      "transactionPosition": null,
      "type": "reward"
    },
    {
      "action": {
        "author": "0xc8ebccc5f5689fa8659d83713341e5ad19349448",
        "rewardType": "uncle",
        "value": "0x340aad21b3b70000"
      },
      "blockHash": "0x3d6122660cc824376f11ee842f83addc3525e2dd6756b9bcf0affa6aa88cf741",
      "blockNumber": 3,
      "result": null,
      "subtraces": 0,
      "traceAddress": [],
      "transactionHash": null,
      "transactionPosition": null,
      "type": "reward"
    }
  ],
  "id": "1"
}
```

Turbo Geth returns:

```
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "17",
      "jsonrpc": "2.0",
      "result": []
    }
  ]
}
```

This image shows the difference pretty clearly for the first example above.
